author: m.kalinin
content:
One another way of exposing validation error in the response to `engine_executePayload`:
`{"status": "VALID" | "INVALID" | "SYNCING", "validation_error": nil | {"code": -32010 "message":"invalid block number"}}`

thoughts?

author: parithosh
content: Yup, the plan is that it will be cooked into the genesis state and hopefully I can co-ordinate an instance of launchpad to allow people to make deposits apart from our own deposit testing.
